posts.post_content:
Hello All, 

I have a T206 Moran Port. W/ A piedmont back.....The cool thing about this card, it has the bust of Mr. Moran offset and seen in the middle of his face....and the entire portrait is offset even into the border!!

I had problems uploading a scan(maybe Chris is around)....but I can send you scans if interested....


Email me the best

[url]jvanderbeck@verizon.net[/url]

taking offers and trades I like rare backs...:)

Here you go.... Nice Johnny V

[URL=http://s138.photobucket.com/user/hogan6g/media/moranghost3_zps73d3fed6.jpg.html][IMG]http://i138.photobucket.com/albums/q257/hogan6g/moranghost3_zps73d3fed6.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

Yawn. When's the GOOD stuff gonna be for sale, Johnny?

;)

I'm assuming that the card to the left (based on the ghost of what appears to be an "O" in the left lower white border) is Fred Mitchell (Toronto)... but Chris is much better than me in picking these out...

[IMG]http://t206resource.com/Gallery%20Images/Mitchell%20Toronto.jpg[/IMG]
(image from T206Resource.com)
